RelatedSentence: ( Legal Newsline ) - Supreme Court justices in Florida may have given plaintiffs attorneys a reason to try to strike down legislatively imposed limits on non-economic damages in other states , a law professor and plaintiffs attorney agree .

( Legal Newsline ) - Supreme Court justices in Florida may have given plaintiffs attorneys a reason to try to strike down legislatively imposed limits on non-economic damages in other states , a law professor and plaintiffs attorney agree .
